landing.heroSubtitle: Make smarter decisions with data-driven insights across 50+ football leagues worldwide
landing.featuresTitle: Everything You Need for Smarter Predictions
landing.featuresSubtitle: Our platform combines real football data with AI analysis to give you the edge
landing.howItWorksSubtitle: Get started in three simple steps
landing.pricingSubtitle: Start free, upgrade when you're ready
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of football fans using AI to gain an edge
landing.copyright: 2026 Spark AI Prediction. All rights reserved.
landing.feature1Desc: Advanced algorithm weighing H2H records, recent form, home/away stats, goals analysis, and league position for accurate match predictions.
landing.feature2Desc: Real-time match scores and updates across 50+ football leagues worldwide. Never miss a moment.
landing.feature3Desc: Share your predictions, discover top analysts, rate and comment on community picks. Build your reputation.
landing.feature4Desc: Compare odds from multiple bookmakers side by side. Find the best value across markets instantly.
landing.feature5Desc: See how key player injuries, suspensions, and form affect match outcomes with detailed player stats.
landing.feature6Desc: Clear risk levels for every prediction. Know exactly what you're getting into before making a decision.
landing.feature7Desc: Full prediction history with accuracy metrics. Track your performance and improve over time.
landing.feature8Desc: Deep statistical models, trend analysis, and comprehensive data visualizations for informed decisions.
landing.feature9Desc: Find bets where the odds exceed the true probability. Maximize your edge with data-driven value picks.
landing.step1Desc: Sign up for free in seconds. No credit card required.
landing.step2Desc: Browse fixtures across 50+ leagues. Select any upcoming match for analysis.
landing.step3Desc: Receive detailed predictions with confidence levels, risk factors, and value insights.

cookies.title: Cookie & Tracking Consent
cookies.message: We use cookies and tracking technologies to improve your experience, analyze site traffic, and understand usage patterns. By accepting, you allow us to collect information about your visits including IP address, browser info, and pages visited.
cookies.learnMore: Learn more in our Terms of Service

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.s1Content: By creating an account on Spark AI Prediction ("the Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, you may not use the Service. Continued use of the Service constitutes acceptance of any updated terms.
terms.s2Content: You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password and account. You must be at least 13 years of age to create an account. Each person may only maintain one account. You are responsible for all activity that occurs under your account.
terms.s3Content:
We collect and process the following data to improve our Service and your experience:

• IP address and approximate location
• Browser type, version, and operating system
• Device type (mobile, tablet, desktop)
• Pages visited and navigation patterns
• Session duration and visit timestamps
• Referral source information
• Account activity and usage statistics

This data is collected only with your explicit consent through our cookie consent banner. You may decline tracking at any time. Data is stored securely and is not sold to third parties.
terms.s4Content:
We use the following cookies and local storage:

• Session identification cookies for tracking consented analytics
• Authentication tokens stored in local storage for maintaining your login
• Language preference cookies for your chosen display language
• Referral tracking cookies to attribute sign-ups to referrers
• Cookie consent preference to remember your tracking choice

You can manage your cookie preferences at any time through your browser settings.
terms.s5Content:
As a user of the Service, you agree to:

• Use the Service only for lawful purposes
• Provide accurate information in your profile and predictions
• Respect other users and maintain a constructive community
• Not attempt to manipulate predictions, ratings, or community metrics
• Not share your account credentials with others
• Report any security vulnerabilities or bugs you discover
• Comply with all applicable local laws regarding sports betting and predictions
terms.s6Content:
The following activities are strictly prohibited:

• Creating multiple accounts or impersonating others
• Posting spam, misleading content, or fraudulent predictions
• Attempting to access other users' accounts or private data
• Using automated bots or scripts to scrape data or manipulate the Service
• Harassing, threatening, or abusing other users
• Reverse engineering or attempting to compromise the Service
• Promoting illegal gambling or unlicensed betting services
• Sharing or redistributing premium content without authorization
• Any activity that disrupts or degrades the Service for other users
terms.s7Content:
We reserve the right to suspend or permanently terminate your account at our sole discretion if you violate any of these Terms of Service. Grounds for termination include, but are not limited to:

• Violation of any prohibited activities listed above
• Repeated violations of community guidelines
• Fraudulent activity or misrepresentation
• Abuse of the referral or earnings system
• Any conduct that harms the Service, its users, or its reputation

Termination may occur without prior notice. You will be notified of the termination and the reason for it. Appeals may be submitted but are reviewed at our discretion.
terms.s8Content:
If your account is terminated for violating these Terms of Service:

• All access to the Service will be revoked immediately
• You will NOT be entitled to any refund, credit, or payment for unused subscription periods
• Any pending earnings, payouts, or creator revenue will be forfeited
• You will NOT receive compensation for any content, predictions, or data associated with your terminated account
• Outstanding subscription charges remain due and payable

For voluntary account deletion (not due to violation), refund policies for active subscriptions will apply as described in our payment terms.
terms.s9Content: All content, design, code, and features of the Service are the intellectual property of Spark AI Prediction. User-generated content (predictions, comments, analysis) remains the property of the user, but by posting it on the Service, you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide license to display and distribute it within the platform.
terms.s10Content: The Service provides AI-powered predictions for informational purposes only. We do not guarantee the accuracy of any prediction or analysis. You acknowledge that sports predictions involve inherent risk, and you use our Service at your own risk. Spark AI Prediction is not liable for any financial losses resulting from decisions made based on our predictions or analysis.
terms.s11Content: We may update these Terms of Service at any time. Significant changes will be communicated through the Service or via email. Continued use of the Service after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the updated terms. We encourage you to review these terms periodically.
terms.s12Content: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through the in-app support chat or email us at support@sparkaipredict.com.

termsGate.title: Terms of Service Update
termsGate.subtitle: Please review and accept our Terms of Service to continue using Spark AI Prediction.
termsGate.agree: I have read and agree to the Terms of Service

profile.title: My Profile
profile.personalInfoDesc: This information helps us verify your identity for support requests.
profile.securityQuestionDisclaimer: Your security question cannot be changed once set, not even by an admin. This is for your account protection.
profile.imageType: Only JPEG, PNG, GIF, and WebP images are allowed
profile.soundDesc: Play a sound when new messages arrive in support chat
profile.referralHint: Share your unique link with friends. Earn 30% lifetime commission on every Pro subscription from your referrals. Commission paid weekly on Fridays.
profile.transactionsDesc: Track all your deposits, withdrawals, purchases, and earnings for full transparency.
profile.dangerZoneDesc: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. All your data, predictions, and community posts will be permanently removed.
profile.deleteWarning: This action is permanent and cannot be undone. All your data will be deleted.
